description:
The legendary thief called The Black Arachnid caused havoc in Cattailia City by stealing valuable treasures and eluding the police by having partner in crime, a Meowth, use Pay Day to confuse the Police Force.
The Black Arachnid continued to operate until an ancestor of Officer Jenny captured the Black Arachnid using a Spinarak.
name: Nyarth (Kaitou Nekohachi)
